item.title: LocalStorage
item.description: Reference Deploy Folder: https://github.com/RHsyseng/labs-index/tree/master/deploy-LocalStorage-operator Deploy 5 disks for each nodes # kcli create disk -s 10 qct11-master-x ---scripted for node in `seq 0 2`; do for a in `seq 0 5`; do kcli create disk -s 10 qct11-master-$node; done; done Create the local storage operator namespace operator group subscription 1-. Namespace: To do that just oc apply -f 01-LS-namespace.yml: --- apiVersion: v1 kind: Namespace metadata: name: openshift-local-storage 2-. Operator group:
